original_title: Treacherous Timber: Loggers And Their Mega Tools
overview: Woodworkers have one of the most dangerous jobs in the world. When ordinary forest companies get stuck, the specialists are called. They remove storm damage in the forest, saw at breathtaking heights and cut down giant rotten trees before the dreaded bark beetle can spread uncontrollably. Whether with the help of a harvester, rope crane or 'flying saw' - you are well equipped for all locations.
title: Treacherous Timber: Loggers And Their Mega Tools
